name: Super Corgi Drifter
description:
It's ball time at the park, and your pet corgi has entered "Zoomies Mode". there's only 1 thing you can do..

hold on for dear life!

  • Use the buttons to switch your dogs attention to another ball.
  • Use the d-pad to drift.
  • Collect fruit to replenish your stamina, don't let it hit zero or it's game over.

Good luck!

oh also feel free to take a look at the full source code here...but beware of bad code smells!
